name: LN Laterality
title: Lymph Nodes Laterality
notes: **Note:** Physician statement of lymph node laterality can be used to code this data item when no other information is available.
rows:
Unilateral - all positive regional nodes with same laterality
OR only one regional node positive
Bilateral - positive bilateral regional lymph nodes
Laterality unknown - positive regional lymph nodes with unknown laterality

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code 8 may result in an edit error.)

Not documented in patient record
Lymph node laterality not assessed or unknown if assessed
